original_title: Parrot Sketch Not Included: Twenty Years of Monty Python
overview: Steve Martin presents selected sketches from "Monty Python's Flying Circus (1969)". It's the well known sketches, though the parrot sketch is not included. Steve Martin has some funny comments on the Pythons.
tagline: It's the best collection that I almost appeared in
title: Parrot Sketch Not Included: Twenty Years of Monty Python
